ing: 1 3/4 cups SwansonÂ® Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Certified Organic Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Natural GoodnessÂ® Chicken Broth
4 cups fresh cut up vegetables (broccoli, celery, peppers, carrots)
des: "Simmering vegetables in chicken broth and fresh minced garlic will bring out the best flavor in whatever combination you may choose."
ins: Heat the broth, garlic and vegetables in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil. Reduce the heat to low. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Drain the vegetables well in a colander.
